instance_template: max_colors(N) :- N = #count{ X : node(X) }. color(1..N) :- max_colors(N). edge(Y, X) :- edge(X, Y).

hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- edge(X, Y), assign(X, C), assign(Y, C).

soft_constraints.asp_rule: chromatic_number(N) :- N = #count{ C : assign(X, C) }. #minimize { N : chromatic_number(N) }.
